enb_long_title: Sixth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: On Monday, 13 November, COP-6 admitted as observers five intergovernmental organizations and 85 non- governmental organizations (FCCC/CP/2000/2).
On Friday, 24 November, Parties also agreed to admit the Association of South- East Asian Nations (ASEAN) as an observer organization, in response to a request by Malaysia (FCCC/CP/2000/2/Add.1).
